name: Take a Random() Walk with Me
description: A real-time interactive 'random walk' governed by a few simple rules: go in a random direction while drawing a line of random thickness for a set amount of time (0.5s), then randomized again. A tribute to Manfred Mohr's 'P-21', done in #800x80 proportions. | Clicking anywhere restarts the drawing. Pressing 'C' toggles between B&W mode and using any Swatch OBJKTs you own. On mobile these 2 actions are combined into a single tap. | Made in p5js | Date: 13 Sept 21 | Artist: @Yazid
